suggest.dazzlesoftware/console: Install dazzlesoftware/console if you want to use the CreateSessionTableCommand class.
suggest.dazzlesoftware/database: Install dazzlesoftware/database if you want to use a database connection managed with Dazzle\Database\DatabaseDriver as a session handler.
suggest.dazzlesoftware/event: The dazzlesoftware/event package is required to use Dazzle\Session\Session.
suggest.dazzlesoftware/input: The dazzlesoftware/input package is required to use Address and Forwarded session validators.
suggest.ext-apcu: To use APCu cache as a session handler
suggest.ext-memcached: To use a Memcached server as a session handler
suggest.ext-redis: To use a Redis server as a session handler
suggest.ext-session: To use the Dazzle\Session\Storage\NativeStorage storage class.
suggest.ext-wincache: To use WinCache as a session handler
